system.effect: Prerequisites: Hits the Spot Ingredients: x2 Tiny Mushrooms; or x1 Big Mushroom; or x1 Balm Mushroom, or x2 Power Herbs, White Herbs, or Mental Herbs Effect: You create up to five Hearty Meals, which may be consumed by Trainers as an Extended Action. When consumed, that Trainer gains +2 to their Max AP until the end of their next extended rest. A Trainer may only be under the effect of one Hearty Meal at a time. Hearty Meals not consumed within 20 minutes of being created lose all flavor and all effect.
